The Ultimate Tips and Tricks for success on OnlyFans

With the numerous perks available on OnlyFans, it’s easier to become a successful OnlyFans creator with less hassle on your path.

OnlyFans Niche Ideas 2023: What Kind of Content is on OnlyFans?

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 56 sec

70% of OnlyFans content is of the NSFW “not safe for work” type. NSFW content comprises mostly adult content that you are not supposed to consume in public such as nude photos and porn videos. But, you do not have to create NSFW content to make sales on OnlyFans. Currently, the OnlyFans market place is suitable for SFW “safe for work” content and appeals to every other creator including top celebrities such as Cardi B and Aaron Carter. 

As a model thinking of joining OnlyFans or switching in between niches, you should be in the position to determine the most profitable niche. A niche defines the topic your content can collectively be categorized under. All niches on OnlyFans can be categorized into NSFW or SFW content types. But, for both cases you can either select to create content for a wide or narrow niche. 

Wide niches cover broad topics while narrow niches focus on a specific topic. For example, health is a wide niche, while men’s workout is a narrow niche. To earn consistently from a niche, you must first go through the wide niche choices and eventually narrow down to a specific topic.

Focusing on a specific topic puts you on top of the competition with reference to the broader category under which your narrow niche falls. The current OnlyFans market is saturated with NSFW content creators making the competition so stiff. Moreover, there are top creators within the SFW content space such as actresses, models, and media personalities. Therefore, curving your own specific niche reduces the number of creators you have to compete with, giving you a chance to make a considerate amount of income on OnlyFans. 

Creating content for a specific niche boosts brand loyalty because you are serving a particular group of people whom you well understand. It is much easier to engage with a group whose problems you clearly understand. Engagement through various ways such as regular messaging and delivery of custom content to your subscribers builds a lasting bond between them and you. 

To select a profitable niche despite the competition takes time and effort. You must first investigate the type of content the top creators post on OnlyFans, the suitable audience to target, the current market pricing of the niche, and more. Luckily, this article simplifies the whole process by outlining profitable niche ideas you can select from. Expect to find OnlyFans content created for these niches by other OnlyFans creators. Additionally, this article will guide you on how to select a niche that fits your lifestyle and desires. 

Make an appointment now

10 Niches Fitting into the NSFW OnlyFans Content Type Category 

1. Feet Pics 

If you are a shy person, this niche might fit you well. Selling feet pics on OnlyFans is popular because it allows the creator to sell anonymously. You are required to shoot high quality photos of your feet and upload them to OnlyFans. Creativity is key when taking the pictures because the photos have to be interesting for your subscribers to purchase. For example, you can choose to shoot your photos while in the bath tab, at the beach or based on the custom requests made by your subscribers. 

Additionally, you can couple your feet pics with varied wares. It is like owning a fashion show but specifically for feet. There are men who have a converse fetish as a part of the shoe fetishism community. If you can satisfy the fetishes of your varied subscribers, you will be in a great position to make consistent sales. 

2. Cosplay NSFW content 

Creating cosplay content requires you to dress up like specific characters in movies, games, or any other TV show. You are supposed to purchase various costumes that match the look of varied characters and create content in the costumes. 

Cosplaying allows you to create a stronger bond with your subscribers especially when you share the same interest in a character with your subscribers. If you decide to create cosplay content, you should target a specific group of subscribers based on the characters they like such as gaming or movie characters. Focusing on one subgroup gives you the chance to understand what your subscribers are willing to pay more to see. 

3. Couples NSFW content 

If you have a couple willing to create NSFW content with you, then this would be a great niche for the two of you. The two of you get to select the type of NSFW content you want to create. For example, you can create porn videos, shoot nude photos, share sexual teasers, and more. It is all up to the two of you. 

The sale of couples’ content is currently on the rise due to the intrigue it brings about. The story of two love birds sharing their love making moments to the world. To spice things up, if you guys are comfortable with it, you can collaborate with other couples. OnlyFans makes collaboration easy through their co-streaming feature. 

4. Femdom or Dominatrix 

Femdom or dominatrix sexual content depicts a woman who is dominant over a partner, either male or female. When creating such content, you have to enact a dominant woman in bed and imagine that your subscribers who are mostly men are the submissive ones. 

When creating such content, you are allowed to bring a partner to help you enact the scenes or you can do it alone. To make the acting interesting, you are allowed to humiliate your virtual submissive character or request them to do humiliating activities. You can also inflict pain on your actual or virtual submissive character. 

5. Amateur NSFW content 

Amateur nudity and porn content sales on OnlyFans simply because you, as the character, are fresh in the game and are bound to look stupid. There are subscribers who love viewing an innocent first-time pornography content creator making content. 

As an amateur content creator, you can decide which type of NSFW content you would love to make such as porn videos or taking of photos or even having sex with a random person on camera. The aim is to look innocent but willing to be dominated during the act. 

6. Transgender, Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual NSFW content 

The LGBT (Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender) community loves watching their own category of NSFW content on OnlyFans. Therefore, if you are among them, you can start creating content that targets LGBT subscribers. 

As a female model, you have the option of creating lesbian or bisexual content. If you are transgender and love identifying as a woman, you can also create, promote, and sell your content on OnlyFans. 

7. POV (Point of View) NSFW content 

Point of view porn makes it seem as if the viewer is taking part in the sex scene. To create point of view sex, you need to have a male partner holding the camera while you pleasure him. Moreover, if you are lesbian, you can take charge as the camera operator and have the woman pleasure you. 

Point of view porn sales due to it making easy for the viewer to immerse themselves in the action. Mostly if your subscriber-base comprises the male gender, they would have a lot of fun imagining themselves being pleasured. 

8. BDSM (Bondage, Discipline, Sadism, Masochism) 

BDSM is a sex type where you are dominant and in control of a submissive partner, where you become the submissive partner being dominated. Bondage involves restricting one’s movement in ways including cuffing them or tying them using a rope. Discipline describes the rules that are to be followed while participating in the sexual act. Sadism refers to the pleasure you get when inflicting pain. Masochism refers to the pleasure the submissive partner feels when they receive pain. 

BDSM is intriguing mostly because it shows dominance and control. You can enact BDSM alone while treating your audience as the submissive partners. You provide the rules and make the whole scene virtually sensual. 

9. MILF (Mother I’d Like to Fuck) NSFW content 

If you are a middle-aged female model, aged around 30-60, this niche would suit you well. MILF is a term used by teenage boys referring to their friend’s sexually attractive moms. This kind of porn genre is on high demand mostly among young adults. 

There is so much you can do if you do decide to create content for this niche. You can decide to explore the BDSM realm as a MILF, create lesbian content as a MILF and more.  

10. Fitness Babe NSFW content 

How about depicting how fit you are but making it sensual and sexy? Well, that is what fitness babe NSFW content involves. You can decide to either go completely or partially nude and share your videos and photos to a specific audience. For example, you can sell your photos depicting you in sexy looking bikinis and lingerie. 

8 Niches Fitting into the SFW OnlyFans Content Type Category 

1. Fitness 

Currently, so many people are health aware and are avoiding junk food. They love hitting the gym. If you are a fitness coach, diet planner, yoga trainer, general doctor, or a certified medical practitioner or health instructor, you can join OnlyFans and make money helping people keep healthy and fit. 

The most popular videos on OnlyFans are gym workout sessions. Despite being a female trainer, you can appeal to both men and women as long as your workout sessions deliver results. 

2. Technology 

The technology industry is evergreen and growing with the invention and innovation of novel technologies. If you love tech including computers, artificial intelligence (AI), augmented reality (AR), and more, you can share your knowledge on OnlyFans. 

Additionally, you can share practical knowledge in terms of courses on OnlyFans. For example, if you can code, you can create courses based on the programming language you are an expert in and sell the courses on OnlyFans. You can even organize coding competitions among your subscribers, charge an entry fee, and reward the winners. 

3. Finance 

If you are well acquainted with the financial world, you can make great finance content on OnlyFans. Numerous people desire to learn how to manage their assets, invest, and make more money. Therefore, if you can provide useful ideas, advice, and practical knowledge on how they can make more money and invest properly, they would be willing to pay for your content. 

If you do not have a financial certification but would desire to make such content, you always have to provide a disclaimer informing your audience that you are not a financial adviser. This ensures that your audience will not come blaming you for their financial faults. It is advisable to create financial content mostly when you are certified and know what you are doing. 

4. Food 

If you are a chef or someone who generally loves experimenting with varied recipes, you can try out this niche. You can share photos of your best meals or even create cooking tutorials for your subscribers. 

The opportunities in the food niche are endless. You can decide to try out varied recipes and share them to your subscribers. Also, you can provide advice on the healthiest types of food and those that your subscribers should avoid eating. 

5. Beauty and Fashion 

If you know how to do make up, you can create makeup tutorials. Additionally, you can make videos reviewing varied beauty products. On the side, you can also share your fashionable outfits as a model and help your subscribers dress better, just like you. 

6. Music

The music industry is wide, allowing you to produce songs of different genres. If you do not have enough cash to invest in a music production studio, you can start producing your own music and sharing it through OnlyFans. This allows you to earn income from your music even before it becomes popular. If you are a solo artist with a huge following, you can also use OnlyFans to monetize your music. 

If you are a songwriter or music producer, you can create tutorials teaching your subscribers music production and writing. On the side, you can create courses teaching varied aspects of music such as how to play varied music instruments and sell to your subscribers. 

7. Relationships and Online Dating 

Many women would love to find the man of their dreams. Unfortunately, only a few of them are able to achieve this dream. If you are a dating coach with expert relationship creation and maintenance advice, you can start your OnlyFans where you serve a specific group of subscribers guiding them on matters of relationships and dating. 

8. Photography, Drawing, and art  

As a photographer or artist, you can start selling exclusive access to your photo and art collections. With the rise in the purchase and selling of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), you can convert your photo and art collections into NFTs of which you can sell on OnlyFans. 

Currently, there are several AI tools used to enhance and create art. If you are an artist or photographer with unique ideas, you can use these tools to generate never seen before photographs. Once you have generated a considerate number of photos, you can share with your subscribers at a fee. 

Make an appointment now

How to Select an OnlyFans Niche that Suits Your Lifestyle: 5 Ways

There is no right or wrong niche. Therefore, do not beat up yourself worrying about selecting a niche that may not work for you. Maybe you have been creating content for a niche that is not selling as expected: do not worry about that, you have the opportunity to select another one. You should have a mentality of testing out various niches until you find one that suits you well. But, do not skip from one niche to the other within a short period. Take time to experiment with one, about six months. 

The process of selecting a niche outlined within this article reduces the chances of you selecting a niche that may disappoint you because it focuses on your current lifestyle state and the subscriber-base your content would attract. 

Referencing your current lifestyle state allows you to create content for your selected niche without stressing or negatively impacting your daily routines. Therefore, you will have time to cater to your OnlyFans business while also running other errands. 

Selecting a niche with a description of your prospective subscribers in mind gives you peace of mind when creating content because you know who you are speaking to. You will have fun when creating content, learning, correcting mistakes, and building a relationship with your subscribers. There are high chances of you finding your niche from the start and never looking back if you follow this process:  

1. Review Your Passions and Interests 

Everyone has that one topic or activity they love the most. What’s yours? Maybe you love helping your friends solve relationship issues, cooking, secretly shooting bikini photos when you are at home, or more. Write down a list of the activities or topics you see yourself wanting to talk about and create content about on a long-term basis. 

If you find it hard to record your beloved topics or activities, consider what you like doing when you are free. When you are free, there are high chances that what you do is the one thing your body system loves to undertake. Such activities give you unforgettable satisfaction because they help you kill stress after a long day of undertaking various activities outlined within your schedule. For example, do you love trying out new recipes after a long day at work? This would be a great niche because it is something you do autonomously. 

You can also consider the topics you love reading about to come up with a list of your interests and passions. For example, politics, real estate, technology, and more. Listing a topic you love reading about gives you an advantage because you have enough knowledge and experience with the topic. You can comfortably answer your prospective subscribers’ questions, demonstrating credibility and authority. 

You can also review the organizations or clubs you are or have been a part of to create a list of your passions and interests. Think of the topics you love or loved contributing to the most to help your fellow members solve their problems. Think of the activities your club or organization got involved in and those that you loved. 

There are several other questions you can ask yourself to determine your interests and passions. Though, keep in mind that the aim of this exercise is to list everything so that you can easily prioritize the activities or topics you love the most. Once you have a priority list, you can proceed to the second step. 

2. Identify the Problems to Solve 

Now that you have a priority list, choose from among the top three a single interest or passion you want to focus on. You must select one so that you can proceed to study the problems surrounding your topic of interest.

Once you have selected a topic of interest, proceed to search for problems that people would love you to solve. To find the problems, you must reach out to your prospective audience or research on the web to find out what problems people are facing. 

The quickest way to determine the problems your prospective subscribers are facing is by doing keyword research. People use keywords to find information on the web using search engines. That is why you rely on keyword study to determine what your prospective subscribers might be asking on the web. By going through a list of the keywords they use, you can derive the problems they are facing. 

You do not have to carry out a keyword study manually. There are several tools, both paid and free on the internet that you can use. Such tools include Google Trends, Moz Keyword Explorer, Semrush, and more. These tools require you to input a topical keyword you want to research so that the tool can output questions and discussion topics that regular web users are seeking answers to on the web. 

You can also join various forums that align with your selected topic of interest to determine what questions the members of the forums ask. You can even run polls within forums asking the members questions regarding the problems they face. 

Without forgetting, you can have one-on-one conversations with different people including family, friends, or acquaintances to determine what problems they face with reference to the topic of interest you feel like you want to create content for. 

If you do find a significant number of problems that are new and yet to be solved, you can proceed to the third step, else, you should review your interests-and-passions priority list and select another topic of interest to determine the possible problems. 

3. Investigate Your Competition 

Your competition includes other OnlyFans creators who are creating content for the same topic of discussion you have selected. They already have a significant footprint in the market and know what to do, that is why you must study what they are doing to determine whether you have a chance of competing. 

Check out what problems your competition is solving. Since OnlyFans does not allow you to view the content of other creators without subscribing, you can rely on the information provided by the other creator within their profile. Check their profile to determine what they are offering to their audience. If some of your competitors do not charge a subscription fee, readily subscribe to their channel to see what they post. You can also go through the social media accounts of your competitors. 

It is reasonable to record the problems your competitors solve so that you do not end up creating content that solves a problem in the same way as that suggested by the other OnlyFans creator. This is repetition. You get to set yourself apart from the other creators by solving current problems faced by your prospective subscribers meaning your content would be original and unique. You also get to improve on the solution provided by the other creators earning you credit for the more optimized solution.  

If after your investigation you find out that all your listed problems have been solved, but you believe that you have better solutions, you should proceed to the next step. The same applies to when you find that there are numerous new problems yet to be solved. But, if you feel like your competitors have better solutions, you should reselect another topic of interest, create a list of problems, and investigate your competition again. 

4. Determine the Market Value of Your Niche 

So, are there people willing to spend on content that solves the problems you have found? Afterall, the aim of having an OnlyFans account is to sell your solutions to your prospective subscriber in the form of content. That is why you must know the profitability of your solutions to evaluate whether your time and efforts would be compensated fully. 

Look through your competitors OnlyFans accounts to determine the amount they charge for their content. Then, research to determine how much they bring in from their OnlyFans business. This move gives you a rough estimate of the amount your content might be worth. 

If possible, subscribe to your top five OnlyFans competitors to review how their sales are going. You get to know which of their content sales the most and whether you can create content capable of making more sales than your competitor. 

If you realize that your selected topic of interest is not selling, you should reconsider it, and go through step one, two, and three again. But, if your topic of interest is making sales, proceed to step five. Though, if you also find that your content is not selling and you are okay with it being that way, you can proceed to step five.

If you feel that you do not want to let go of a topic it means you are really passionate about it and are willing to share it to the world while hoping it makes sales. There are creators who have been able to monetize topics that are mostly free on numerous social media platforms such as comedy, you could be one of them.

5. Test Out Your Selected Topic of Interest 

Once you find a topic of interest that satisfies the requirements mentioned within phase two, three, and four, you must test the topic out by creating content. You should start creating quality and valuable content for your audience and promoting it on various social media platforms such as Twitter and Reddit. 

OnlyFans is a long-term venture: that is why you must take time to test a topic of interest before you settle on it. You can create and market your content for about six months before you decide whether the topic suits you. If your selected topic’s content does not sell, you can consider switching niches using the process outlined in this article or getting help from a great OnlyFans agency.

Conclusion

Selecting a profitable OnlyFans niche requires your utmost focus, time, and effort to analyze various aspects such as your interests or passions, the problems you can solve, what your competitors are doing, and the market value of your niche. After analyzing these aspects, you must test your selected topic of interest to determine if you are willing to keep building your OnlyFans around it for a long period. 

There are numerous niches out there, but the ones mentioned in this article are among the most profitable. If you find it hard to select a niche or switch between niches, seek help from Fandafia. Fandafia hosts a team of experts who are well equipped with the knowledge and experience required to help you select a profitable niche. Reach out to them today.
